task.title: How to Set Up a Recurring Event
task.shortdesc: Here are the instructions on how to set up a recurring event in the calendar application.

prereq.p: To successfully set up a recurring event, you must know what a recurring event is.

step.cmd: Create or open the event you want to set up as a recurring event.
Click the "Does not repeat" drop-down menu under the date and time section.
Select a predefined recurrence pattern (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly, annual) or choose "Custom" to create a custom recurrence.
Set specific days, intervals (e.g., every 2 weeks), and the end date for the series.
Click Save to save the event.
Check the calendar to ensure the event appears correctly for all intended dates.

result.p: The recurring event will be displayed on the calendar for the selected date(s) and time.
